name: Lex baiscs in Bozgay ande buzzgei

description:
One day, Lex is killend Alex, now Alex school is his school, 

But Alex was suddenly resurrected on June 24, 2021. Alex returned to Lex's school and killed Lex, but Lex was resurrected. Repeat the cycle. Until one day, they stopped fighting, but joined forces. Their bodies merged with each other and became some human-like creatures. . .

and, this is a Alex's basics mod
